DOC.brief_summary: A cross sectional study design evaluate diagnostic value CRD test pregnant woman attend Dhaka Medical College Hospital Hospital Materno-Infantil Inguarán , tertiary level facility Bangladesh Mexico City .
DOC.brief_title: Diagnosis Prediction Pre-Eclampsia Using Congo Red Dot Test Bangladesh Mexico
DOC.detailed_description: A cross sectional study design evaluate diagnostic value Congo Red Dot test pregnant woman attend Dhaka Medical College Hospital Hospital Materno-Infantil Inguarán , tertiary level facility Bangladesh Mexico City . Women attend hospital clinically confirm case preeclampsia clinically healthy woman deliver term eligible study . Investigators enroll 200 woman facility . Investigators target follow woman enrollment : woman clinical diagnosis preeclampsia ( severe , mild superimpose ) ( n=100 ) ; clinically healthy woman deliver term ( n=100 ) . The purpose research determine clinical utility congophilia ( affinity dye Congo Red ) diagnosis prediction preeclampsia . Investigators determine diagnostic value test test urine sample provide determine presence absence proteinuria congophilia .
DOC.criteria: Pregnant Willing provide urine sample Eligible consent research accord local law regulation Present clinical diagnosis preeclampsia ( severe , mild superimpose ) OR clinically healthy deliver term
